title.label: The best game and so much fun

content.label: The only problem is that it won’t load anymore. I stopped playing for about a year and now it will not load on my iPad or any other device for that matter. What happened? Did you guys just abandon the game? I’d like to be able to play again.

I had completely forgotten about this game and then I remembered it, searched it up, and downloaded it. Then I went to play it and the first World wasn’t even there and I couldn’t play the second world because I didn’t have enough MXP because I didn’t even play the first world because it wasn’t there.Anyways play this game if you’re on Waze because the reason why I deleted it the last time was because it was glitching.

Won’t go past the initial screen, just crashes. Can’t be played anymore :(
Last update was 4 years ago so I guess it’s not a surprise. They should remove it from the App Store if they won’t even test if it works on newer iOS versions.
It says that it’s compatible with my iPad but it’s not.

I used to love this game so much when I was younger. I was around 7 maybe, And I played this everywhere I went on my ipad. The entire app was fine. It was super fun, I’m glad i came across this game again. Nostalgic 🥺 I remember I was on Mystic Mountains before my game got deleted since we were upgrading our tech. 

So Downloading this game, I would DEFINITELY RECOMMEND getting this app! It’s fun, it’s cute, It’s everything a child would want. Redford and Bluto were my main back then, and still are. The only issue is that the revive ads aren’t working properly. And what I mean by that is they won’t load. I retried and everything, and they still would not load. I tried it on my friend’s iphone X and i guess the game crashed for her, like it would not load.
I used to play this game all the time! Now I have an Android phone and can only play this on my iPad. But it doesn’t work on here! Wish that could be fixed :(

I absolutely love this game so much! But, I was here to talk about the monsters, inc. run game. It’s not on the App Store anymore. PLEASE GET THAT GAME BACK!!!!!!! It was my favorite game ever. Please please please try to get it back.

I’ve played the game before and liked it but the screen shrinks and 
I can’t tap anything

Thanks for fixing this game. I used to play it on my iPhone 4 and it’s still one of my all time favorite games. A year or two ago I tried to play it but it wouldn’t go past the load screen. Works fine now! A sequel would be great!
When will the 7th world be released?
I absolutely adore and love this game ive played it 5 years ago and then deleted it after getting into uni now im graduating and back to playing i love love love this game

I love this game so much it was the first ever game i played for Hours a day when i was 7 i always looked where the gems are and my sister got it too. We deleted the app because it got boring after a long time and didnt know what to do know so i played different games until 2020 I was trying to figure out the games name untill i searched mega jump and found it. Im a little bit crying because this was such amazing game and last update was 4years ago. If you still see this maybe make more updates or something Would be AMAZING TO SEE.
It’s the OG game. I still hate the fact that some other company made that “creepy mega monster escape” crap!!!!!!!!!

Yes! It finally works!

Hello and welcome to Mega Run from Get Set Games and I am so glad you are here. The main menu is where I go to store and get more stars or characters from MP. Buy everything you want. Woodland Grove, Tropic Shore and more levels to play. From the same creators of Mega Jump Infinite, Poptweets, Addicus and more! Settings are made from extras with Music and Sound and it turns on/off. Leaderboards and Achievements wants to access with Turns, Friends, Challenges, Requests and Games have only on Game Center or the challengers from OpenFeint. Let me know what you think if you made some and I will like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter. So, enjoy playing. Goodbye!
I like this game but my game shows up on the left bottom corner and it won’t even let me play the game if you have something please fix it thank you

title.label: Not working on iPhone XS Max

content.label: I absolutely love this game!! It’s so fun!! I ended up playing all the worlds and replaying them until I collected all gems and got all stars. However, this game isn’t working. Every time I open it, it brings me to the home screen then completely disappears and closes the app, like it crashes. I can’t even play it anymore :( and for some reason, my game accomplishments are nowhere to be found. I hope this is just a bug and that’ll be fixed soon!!

title.label: Works on most, but not new big screens

content.label: Absolutely hands-down without a doubt the most fun, well-designed, amazing game ever created on the iOS system… Game of the year 2012… Abandoned… Now with the integration of unity and other android-esk retro stick figure/stupid games… I feel like only a purist would like something like this… That’s too bad… Stupid people are going to do the stupid thing that’s party instead of doing amazing thing, That for one reason or another was discontinued three years ago… Let me know when you get some iPad compatibility I didn’t pay $1000 to have more functionality but less fun

I agree w/ Maize grac geigger. Had sans problems. Love the game but when I reloaded it after a delete it crashes 100% of the time. Is this a punishment for prior deletion? I’m sure it’s not. But regardless, I want to PLAY but your game won’t let me! Help.
